Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.observer.ModelObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Adder, Verificator
public class Player extends ModelObservable implements Adder, Verificator
This class implements the Player's identity.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player​(String nickname)
    This constructor creates a new unassociated player, without giving it the match.

    • addFaithPoints

      public boolean addFaithPoints​(int quantity) throws LastRoundException
      This method adds faith points to the faith path, looking for the match end.
      Specified by:
      addFaithPoints in interface Adder
      Parameters:
      quantity - is the quantity of steps
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      LastRoundException - if this player reaches the end of his faith path

    • addBlackPoints

      public boolean addBlackPoints​(int quantity) throws LastRoundException
      This method adds points to the blackMarker (in single player).
      Parameters:
      quantity - the quantity of faith points to Lorenzo
      Returns:
      a boolean
      Throws:
      LastRoundException - when Lorenzo reaches the end of the path

    • discardRemains

      public boolean discardRemains() throws InvalidOperationException, LastRoundException
      This method calls the same method inside the warehouse. Notifies every other player about the discarded resources (for faith points).
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      InvalidOperationException - if the discard operation is not valid.
      LastRoundException - if discarding someone reaches the end of the path.

    • leadersChoice

      public boolean leadersChoice​(ArrayList<LeaderCard> choseLeaders) throws InvalidOperationException
      This method sets the in-hand leaders chosen by the player.
      Parameters:
      choseLeaders - a list containing the chosen starting leaders
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      InvalidOperationException - if the chosen leaders are not present in the handLeader's list.

    • activateLeader

      public boolean activateLeader​(LeaderCard leader)
      This method checks for the possibility to activate the leader, then activates it passing through the card's methods.
      Parameters:
      leader - the card to activate
      Returns:
      true if ok, else false

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the result

    • discardUselessLeader

      public boolean discardUselessLeader​(LeaderCard leader) throws LastRoundException
      This method discards the non-chosen leaders from handLeader. Requires that the leader card must be contained in the handLeader list.
      Parameters:
      leader - the leader to discard
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      LastRoundException

    • switchShelf

      public boolean switchShelf​(int shelf1, int shelf2) throws InvalidOperationException
      This method calls other switch methods directly on the warehouse instance.
      Parameters:
      shelf1 - first index
      shelf2 - second index
      Returns:
      a boolean
      Throws:
      InvalidOperationException - when the switch is impossible

    • marketDeal

      public int marketDeal​(boolean row, int number) throws InvalidOperationException, LastRoundException
      this method does a market action and returns the number of white marbles.
      Parameters:
      row - if true, represents a 'row' draw, else a 'column' draw.
      number - the number of the row or column
      Returns:
      the number of white marble in the selected row or column
      Throws:
      InvalidOperationException
      LastRoundException

    • whiteMarbleInsertion

      public boolean whiteMarbleInsertion​(int numWhite)
      This method inserts white conversions on market buffer.
      Parameters:
      numWhite - the number of conversions
      Returns:
      a boolean

    • drawDevelopmentCard

      public void drawDevelopmentCard​(int gridR, int gridC) throws NoMoreCardsException, InvalidCardRequestException, LastRoundException
      This method takes the Temp DevelopmentCard and puts it in tempDevCard.
      Parameters:
      gridR - the chosen row
      gridC - the chosen column
      Throws:
      NoMoreCardsException
      InvalidCardRequestException
      LastRoundException

    • insertDevelopmentCard

      public void insertDevelopmentCard​(int slot) throws LastRoundException, InvalidOperationException
      This method takes the Temp DevelopmentCard from the tempDevCard object and puts it in the DevCardSlot. Requires that the player must have already payed the relative resources himself before.
      Parameters:
      slot - the slot in which the card will be inserted
      Throws:
      LastRoundException
      InvalidOperationException

    • moveIntoWarehouse

      public boolean moveIntoWarehouse​(PhysicalResource resource, int shelf) throws ShelfInsertException, InvalidQuantityException
      This method tries to insert the resource into the warehouse. Catches here the exceptions relative to moveInShelf procedure. It does not notify the player in order to avoid messages flooding.
      Parameters:
      resource - is the resource to insert
      shelf - is the chosen shelf
      Returns:
      true if operation ended successfully, else false
      Throws:
      ShelfInsertException
      InvalidQuantityException

    • payFromWarehouse

      public boolean payFromWarehouse​(PhysicalResource res, int shelf) throws InvalidCardRequestException, NotEnoughResourcesException
      This method tries to pay "res" taking it from the warehouse. Handles InvalidCardRequestException and NotEnoughResourcesException.
      Parameters:
      shelf - is the chosen shelf
      res - is the resource to pay
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      InvalidCardRequestException - relative to the problem about the incompatibility between the requested resource and the one in the shelf
      NotEnoughResourcesException

    • payFromStrongbox

      public boolean payFromStrongbox​(PhysicalResource res) throws NotEnoughResourcesException
      This method tries to pay "res" taking it from the strongbox. Handles NotEnoughResourcesException.
      Parameters:
      res - is the resource to pay
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResourcesException

    • produce

      public boolean produce() throws LastRoundException
      this method produces the actual production in tempProduction.
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      LastRoundException - if producing the tempProduction this player reaches the end of his FaithPath

    • totalWinPoints

      public int totalWinPoints()
      this method returns the player's total amount of win points.
      Returns:
      int totalWinPoints

    • clear

      public void clear()
      This method clears player's situation for a new match. Used by the RematchPhaseController, in case of rematch.

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
